participant_1.background:
I am a hard worker who is passionate about my job
i eat all take out.
i have a marketing job.
i have always had long hair.
my hobbies include reading and cycling.

participant_2.background:
I like watching football on TV while my boyfriend is away in the army.
i am a cat person.
I am an introverted musician who has been with my current employer for five years.
i have never been on an airplane.
I enjoy my work as a software engineer, but it can be stressful

content.text: Hello! Nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read and cycle. I'm also pretty passionate about my marketing job. How about you?
I'm a musician and I love to watch football on TV. I'm also a bit of an introvert. What do you think about traveling?
I love to travel, but I haven't been on an airplane in a while. How about you?
I've never been on an airplane either! I'm a little scared of flying. What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love working in marketing because I get to be creative and come up with new ideas. What do you like most about your job?
I love that I get to work on music all day. I'm really lucky to have found a job that I love. I'm glad you like your job too!
Thank you! It's really nice to meet you. I hope we can talk more soon.
Me too! It's been nice chatting with you.
